```{r, echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
library("modelsummary")

library(modelsummary)
d <- mtcars %>%
  rename(mpg_with_longer_name = mpg)
t <- datasummary_balance(~am, data = d)
colnames(t@table_dataframe) <- c("", "Mean", "SD", 
  "Mean", "SD", "Diff", "SE")
tt(t@table_dataframe) %>%
  group_tt(j = list(`Enrolled` = 2:3, `Never` = 4:5))
```
